name: Porradaria Upgrade
description: Mate a saudade dos jogos de plataforma dos anos 90 com o misterioso Ninja, e viva uma completa experiência retrô, em um mundo (quase) totalmente desenhado em pixel-art!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Microsoft® Windows® 7 ou superior 处理器: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz ou superior 内存: 512 MB RAM DirectX 版本: 9.0 存储空间: 需要 22 MB 可用空间

reviews.review_text: 3.9/10 - Retro, Amateur Pixel Platformer  Price is a relevant factor when doing my reviews. $5 for this must be some kind of joke; the acceptable price for a rough pixel game such as this is approximately $0-1. Nothing new invented here; there are far better and cheaper platformers out there.   My main issue was with the controls, they were imprecise to say the least. If you want to jump to the next platform you have to really exaggerate the motion to successfully make it. There is no room for quick reactions that can save you from dying. I just like to have complete control of my character; losing because the controls are wonky is an automatic ‘thumbs down’.  I know the sequel has been Greenlit... but how? and why? Worth $0.99     Accidently Reviewed
